DOC.brief_title: An Interactive Internet Intervention Adults With Insomnia
DOC.detailed_description: Insomnia define complaint poor sleep , well difficulty initiate and/or maintain sleep 3 nights/week 6 month . Insomnia may contribute daytime fatigue , impaired performance , confuse think judgment , difficulty work personal task . Cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) find significant short- long-term benefit people insomnia . Access CBT many people , however , limited , due high cost treatment limited number train professional . Delivering CBT insomnia via Internet could help make widely available . This study compare effectiveness online CBT intervention improve sleep , mood , quality life people insomnia static educational website . Participants study randomly assign receive online CBT intervention static patient education website . The intervention period last 9 week . During intervention period , participant assign patient education website give content address strategy deal insomnia . Those assign use Internet intervention review interactive , tailored content specific user 's difficulty . Participants complete questionnaire two week daily sleep diary symptoms four time point - beginning study , immediately complete 9 week program , 6 month later , 12 month later .
DOC.criteria: Age 21 65 year old . Have sleeponset insomnia and/or sleep maintenance insomnia ( > 30 minute least 3 nights/week ) . Have insomnia symptom last least 6 month . Have average total sleep time â‰¤ 6.5 hour . Sleep disturbance ( associate daytime fatigue ) cause significant distress impairment social , occupational , area function . Have regular access computer Internet . Reside United States US Citizens live outside United States Pregnancy Report physical illness deem active , unstable , degenerative , and/or progressive , congestive heart failure , dementia , acute pain . Bipolar disorder define manic hypomanic episode treatment within past 10 year . Severe depression . Endorse risk suicide . Endorse alcohol drug abuse within past year . Presence another untreated sleep disorder ( e.g. , sleep apnea , periodic leg movement ) . Have irregular sleep schedule , usual bedtime earlier 8:00pm later 2:00am arise time earlier 4:00am later 10:00am . Current psychological treatment insomnia . Initiating psychological treatment within past 3 month . Unstable medication regimen ( change schedule dosage within past 3 month ) medication regimen think impact sleep .
